http:
  routers:
    stash-router-http:
      rule: Host(`stash.bourne.cloud`)
      service: stash-service
    stash-router-https:
      rule: Host(`stash.bourne.cloud`)
      service: stash-service
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
  services:
    stash-service:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "http://192.168.1.15:9999"
